name: Way of Redemption (itch)
description:
Nolan Black, a very pessimistic, average 32 year old guy, one day finally loses his life, but he wakes up to the fact that he was given a second chance in his life, accompanied by a very odd occasion, which brings a very odd person with it.  On this journey Nolan learns a lot about himself, but these lessons come with a lot of blood. What will become of him? That's up to you player!

This is currently a demo version, and we are working of the full game. Updates are to be anticipated. We have released 2 chapters so far. And we can't wait to hear your thoughts on it!
